TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit WindowsIdentity extends System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity implements class System.IDisposable, class System.Runtime.Serialization.IDeserializationCallback, class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable, class System.Security.Principal.IIdentity
Public Class WindowsIdentity Inherits ClaimsIdentity Implements IDeserializationCallback, IDisposable, ISerializable
public ref class WindowsIdentity : System::Security::Claims::ClaimsIdentity, IDisposable, System::Runtime::Serialization::IDeserializationCallback, System::Runtime::Serialization::ISerializable
type WindowsIdentity = class inherit ClaimsIdentity interface IIdentity interface IDeserializationCallback interface ISerializable interface IDisposable

summary.span: 表示 Windows 用户。

span.span: Represents a Windows user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方法来创建对象，表示当前用户。Call the method to create a object that represents the current user. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此类型实现接口。This type implements the interface. 在使用完类型后，您应直接或间接释放类型。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接释放类型，调用其中的方法`try` / `catch`块。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要间接释放类型，请使用 `using`（在 C# 中）或 `Using`（在 Visual Basic 中）等语言构造。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 有关详细信息，请参阅中的"使用对象实现 IDisposable"一节接口主题。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. ## Examples 下面的示例演示使用的成员类。The following example shows the use of members of class. 一个示例，演示如何获取 Windows 帐户令牌通过调用非托管的 Win32`LogonUser`函数，并使用该标记来模拟其他用户，请参阅类。For an example showing how to obtain a Windows account token through a call to the unmanaged Win32 `LogonUser` function, and use that token to impersonate another user, see the class. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers/CPP/windowsidentitymembers.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers/CS/windowsidentitymembers.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class for the user represented by the specified Windows account token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表显示的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`Negotiate`| ||`Normal`| ||`false`| > [!NOTE] > 可以检索所表示的令牌`userToken`通过调用非托管的代码如 Win32 API`LogonUser`函数。You can retrieve the token represented by `userToken` by calling unmanaged code such as the Win32 API `LogonUser` function. 请务必发布`userToken`通过调用 Win32 API`CloseHandle`函数。Always release `userToken` by calling the Win32 API `CloseHandle` function. 调用非托管的代码的详细信息，请参阅[使用非托管 DLL 函数](~/docs/framework/interop/consuming-unmanaged-dll-functions.md)。For more information on calling unmanaged code, see [Consuming Unmanaged DLL Functions](~/docs/framework/interop/consuming-unmanaged-dll-functions.md).

summary.span: 初始化以指定用户主名称 (UPN) 表示的用户的 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class for the user represented by the specified User Principal Name (UPN).

remarks.format: ## Remarks UPN 采用格式*用户名*@*domainname*.com，换而言之，电子邮件地址。A UPN has the format *username*@*domainname*.com, in other words, an email address. 在中标识的 UPN`sUserPrincipalName`用于检索该用户通过 Win32 API 的令牌`LsaLogonUser`函数。The UPN identified in `sUserPrincipalName` is used to retrieve a token for that user through the Win32 API `LsaLogonUser` function. 反过来，该令牌用于标识用户。In turn that token is used to identify the user. 可能会因为无法使用所提供的 UPN 登录返回异常。An exception might be returned due to the inability to log on using the supplied UPN. > [!NOTE] > 此构造函数用于仅在已加入到 Windows Server 2003 或更高版本的域的计算机上。This constructor is intended for use only on computers joined to Windows Server 2003 or later domains. 对于早期的域类型引发异常。An exception is thrown for earlier domain types. 此限制是因为，此构造函数使用[KERB_S4U_LOGON 结构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=143533)，最初在 Windows Server 2003 中引入。This restriction is due to the fact that this constructor uses the [KERB_S4U_LOGON structure](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=143533), which was first introduced in Windows Server 2003.

exception.span: Windows 返回 Windows NT 状态代码 STATUS_ACCESS_DENIED。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class for the user represented by the specified Windows account token and the specified authentication type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表显示的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`Normal`| ||`false`| 值`type`参数用于设置参数。The value of the `type` parameter is used to set the parameter. 如果`type`是`null`，安全系统组到`Negotiate`Windows Vista 和更高版本的 Windows 操作系统和到上`Kerberos`早期版本的 Windows 操作系统上。If `type` is `null`, the security system sets to `Negotiate` on Windows Vista and later versions of the Windows operating system, and to `Kerberos` on earlier versions of the Windows operating system. 安全系统不使用此值;它是仅用于提供信息。The security system does not use this value; it is for informational use only. > [!NOTE] > 可以检索所表示的令牌`userToken`通过调用非托管的代码如 Win32 API`LogonUser`函数。You can retrieve the token represented by `userToken` by calling unmanaged code such as the Win32 API `LogonUser` function. 请务必发布`userToken`通过调用 Win32 API`CloseHandle`函数。Always release `userToken` by calling the Win32 API `CloseHandle` function. 调用非托管的代码的详细信息，请参阅[使用非托管 DLL 函数](~/docs/framework/interop/consuming-unmanaged-dll-functions.md)。For more information on calling unmanaged code, see [Consuming Unmanaged DLL Functions](~/docs/framework/interop/consuming-unmanaged-dll-functions.md). ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何使用构造函数创建的新实例按指定的 Windows 帐户标记和指定的身份验证类型表示的用户的类。The following code shows the use of the constructor to create a new instance of the class for the user represented by the specified Windows account token and the specified authentication type. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers/CPP/windowsidentitymembers.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers/CS/windowsidentitymembers.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers/VB/Form1.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值`type`参数用于设置参数。The value of the `type` parameter is used to set the parameter. 如果`type`是`null`，安全系统组到`Negotiate`Windows Vista 和更高版本的 Windows 操作系统和到上`Kerberos`早期版本的 Windows 操作系统上。If `type` is `null`, the security system sets to `Negotiate` on Windows Vista and later versions of the Windows operating system, and to `Kerberos` on earlier versions of the Windows operating system. 安全系统不使用此值;它是仅用于提供信息。The security system does not use this value; it is for informational use only. 在中标识的 UPN`sUserPrincipalName`用于检索该用户通过 Win32 API 的令牌`LsaLogonUser`函数。The UPN identified in `sUserPrincipalName` is used to retrieve a token for that user through the Win32 API `LsaLogonUser` function. 反过来，该令牌用于标识用户。In turn that token is used to identify the user. 可能会因为无法使用所提供的 UPN 登录返回异常。An exception might be returned due to the inability to log on using the supplied UPN. > [!NOTE] > 此构造函数用于仅在已加入到 Windows Server 2003 或更高版本的域的计算机上。This constructor is intended for use only on computers joined to Windows Server 2003 or later domains. 对于早期的域类型引发异常。An exception is thrown for earlier domain types. 此限制是因为，此构造函数使用[KERB_S4U_LOGON 结构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=143533)，最初在 Windows Server 2003 中引入。This restriction is due to the fact that this constructor uses the [KERB_S4U_LOGON structure](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=143533), which was first introduced in Windows Server 2003.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表显示的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`false`| 值`type`参数用于设置参数。The value of the `type` parameter is used to set the parameter. 如果`type`是`null`，安全系统组到`Negotiate`Windows Vista 和更高版本的 Windows 操作系统和到上`Kerberos`早期版本的 Windows 操作系统上。If `type` is `null`, the security system sets to `Negotiate` on Windows Vista and later versions of the Windows operating system, and to `Kerberos` on earlier versions of the Windows operating system. 安全系统不使用此值;它是仅用于提供信息。The security system does not use this value; it is for informational use only. > [!NOTE] > 可以检索所表示的令牌`userToken`通过调用非托管的代码如 Win32 API`LogonUser`函数。You can retrieve the token represented by `userToken` by calling unmanaged code such as the Win32 API `LogonUser` function. 请务必发布`userToken`通过调用 Win32 API`CloseHandle`函数。Always release `userToken` by calling the Win32 API `CloseHandle` function. 调用非托管的代码的详细信息，请参阅[使用非托管 DLL 函数](~/docs/framework/interop/consuming-unmanaged-dll-functions.md)。For more information on calling unmanaged code, see [Consuming Unmanaged DLL Functions](~/docs/framework/interop/consuming-unmanaged-dll-functions.md). ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何使用构造函数创建的新实例类表示由指定的 Windows 帐户标记、 指定的身份验证类型和指定的 Windows 帐户类型的用户。The following code shows the use of the constructor to create a new instance of the class for the user represented by the specified Windows account token, the specified authentication type, and the specified Windows account type. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性是信息性;由安全系统不使用它。This property is informational; it is not used by the security system. 在 Windows Vista 和更高版本的 Windows 操作系统上，此属性的默认值是`Negotiate`，其中选择最佳安全支持提供程序 (SSP) 根据客户配置安全策略。On Windows Vista and later versions of the Windows operating system, the default value for this property is `Negotiate`, which chooses the best security support provider (SSP) based on customer-configured security policy. 早期版本的 Windows 操作系统的默认属性值是`Kerberos`。The default property value for earlier versions of the Windows operating system is `Kerberos`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: 释放由 使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 后，应调用 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法使 处于不可用状态。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 在调用，必须释放对所有引用这样垃圾回收器才能收回内存的占用。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清理了非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)并[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法由公共`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写时小心不要引用已经释放的早期调用中的对象。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关详细信息并，请参阅[清理了非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).

Public Shared Function GetAnonymous () As WindowsIdentity

summary.span: 返回 对象，可在代码中将其用作 sentinel 值来表示匿名用户。

span.span: Returns a object that you can use as a sentinel value in your code to represent an anonymous user.

summary.span: 属性值不表示 Windows 操作系统使用的内置匿名标识。

span.span: The property value does not represent the built-in anonymous identity used by the Windows operating system.
An object that represents an anonymous user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回一个空对象，可将操作视为匿名。This property returns an empty object that enables you to treat operations as anonymous. 属性值不对应于 Windows 的匿名用户，不能用于模拟。The property value does not correspond to a Windows anonymous user and cannot be used for impersonation. 另请注意此属性返回的标识不是静态的;每次调用返回不同的匿名标识。Also, note that the identity returned by this property is not static; each call to returns a different anonymous identity. 可以使用属性来检测的返回值。You can use the property to detect the return value from . 但是，检测 Windows 匿名标识，此方法返回的匿名标识。However, detects both the Windows anonymous identity and the anonymous identity returned by this method. 若要使用后一种标识，缓存返回值而不是依靠属性。To use the latter identity, cache the return value instead of relying on the property. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何使用方法以返回对象，表示匿名 Windows 用户。The following code shows the use of the method to return a object that represents an anonymous Windows user. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers#15](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers/CPP/windowsidentitymembers.cpp#15)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers/CS/windowsidentitymembers.cs#15)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers/VB/Form1.vb#15)]

span.span: to return the only if the thread is currently impersonating; to return the of the thread if it is impersonating or the of the process if the thread is not currently impersonating.

returns.span: 表示 Windows 用户的对象。

span.span: An object that represents a Windows user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`ifImpersonating`是`true`和线程不模拟，返回对象不具有任何值。If `ifImpersonating` is `true` and the thread is not impersonating, the returned object has no value. 如果`ifImpersonating`是`false`和线程模拟，则线程返回。If `ifImpersonating` is `false` and the thread is impersonating, the for the thread is returned. 如果`ifImpersonating`是`false`和线程不模拟，则返回过程。If `ifImpersonating` is `false` and the thread is not impersonating, the for the process is returned.

param.name: desiredAccess
param.span: 枚举值的按位组合。

span.span: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values.

summary.span: 返回一个 对象，该对象使用指定的所需标记访问级别来表示当前 Windows 用户。

span.span: Returns a object that represents the current Windows user, using the specified desired token access level.
An object that represents the current user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `desiredAccess`参数指定标识的访问权限的访问令牌的请求的类型的访问掩码。The `desiredAccess` parameter specifies an access mask that identifies the requested types of access to the access token. 这些请求的访问类型进行比较与令牌的自由访问控制列表 (DACL) 来确定哪些类型的访问权限被授予或拒绝。These requested access types are compared with the token's discretionary access control list (DACL) to determine which types of access are granted or denied.

span.span: for ability to manipulate the principal object.
Associated enumeration: .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Security.Principal.WindowsImpersonationContext Impersonate() cil managed
Public Overridable Function Impersonate () As WindowsImpersonationContext
abstract member Impersonate : unit -> System.Security.Principal.WindowsImpersonationContext override this.Impersonate : unit -> System.Security.Principal.WindowsImpersonationContext

summary.span: 模拟 对象表示的用户。

span.span: Impersonates the user represented by the object.

returns.span: 表示模拟之前 Windows 用户的对象，这可以用于恢复为原始用户的上下文。

span.span: An object that represents the Windows user prior to impersonation; this can be used to revert to the original user's context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Windows NT 平台上当前用户必须具有足够的权限以允许模拟。On Windows NT platforms, the current user must have sufficient rights to allow impersonation. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何获取 Windows 帐户标记，通过调用非托管的 Win32`LogonUser`函数，以及如何使用该令牌来模拟其他用户，然后恢复为原始标识。The following example demonstrates how to obtain a Windows account token by calling the unmanaged Win32 `LogonUser` function, and how to use that token to impersonate another user and then revert to the original identity. [!code-cpp[WindowsIdentity Impersonation#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/WindowsIdentity Impersonation/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WindowsIdentity Impersonation#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/WindowsIdentity Impersonation/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WindowsIdentity Impersonation#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/WindowsIdentity Impersonation/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 匿名标识尝试执行模拟。

span.span: An anonymous identity attempted to perform an impersonation.
A Win32 error occurred.

para.span: Microsoft Windows 98 和 Windows Millennium Edition (Windows Me) 平台不具有的用户令牌，因为模拟不会在这些平台上的发生。

span.span: Because Microsoft Windows 98 and Windows Millennium Edition (Windows Me) platforms do not have user tokens, impersonation cannot take place on those platforms.

para.span: 使用后，务必调用方法来结束模拟。

span.span: After using , it is important to call the method to end the impersonation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Security.Principal.WindowsImpersonationContext Impersonate(native int userToken) cil managed
Public Shared Function Impersonate (userToken As IntPtr) As WindowsImpersonationContext

param.name: userToken
param.span: Windows 帐户标记的句柄。

span.span: The handle of a Windows account token.

param.span: 通常，通过调用非托管代码（如调用 Win32 API 函数）来检索此标记。

span.span: This token is usually retrieved through a call to unmanaged code, such as a call to the Win32 API function.

summary.span: 模拟指定用户标记表示的用户。

span.span: Impersonates the user represented by the specified user token.

returns.span: 表示模拟之前 Windows 用户的对象，该对象可以用于恢复为原始用户的上下文。

span.span: An object that represents the Windows user prior to impersonation; this object can be used to revert to the original user's context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Windows NT 平台上当前用户必须具有足够的权限以允许模拟。On Windows NT platforms, the current user must have sufficient rights to allow impersonation. > [!NOTE] > 调用方法替换`userToken`的值等效于调用 Win32`RevertToSelf`函数。Calling the method with a `userToken` value of is equivalent to calling the Win32 `RevertToSelf` function. 如果当前正在模拟其他用户，控制将恢复为原始用户。If another user is currently being impersonated, control reverts to the original user. 有关调用非托管代码的详细信息，请参阅[使用非托管 DLL 函数](~/docs/framework/interop/consuming-unmanaged-dll-functions.md)。For more information about calls to unmanaged code, see [Consuming Unmanaged DLL Functions](~/docs/framework/interop/consuming-unmanaged-dll-functions.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何获取 Windows 帐户标记，通过调用非托管的 Win32`LogonUser`函数，以及如何使用该令牌来模拟其他用户，然后恢复为原始标识。The following example demonstrates how to obtain a Windows account token by calling the unmanaged Win32 `LogonUser` function, and how to use that token to impersonate another user and then revert to the original identity. [!code-csharp[WindowsIdentity Impersonation2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/windowsidentity impersonation2/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WindowsIdentity Impersonation2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/windowsidentity impersonation2/vb/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性检测 Windows 匿名标识和返回的匿名标识方法。The property detects both the Windows anonymous identity and the anonymous identity that is returned by the method. 匿名帐户通常仅只能从基于 ASP.NET 的应用程序中时遇到由 Internet 信息服务 (IIS) 允许匿名访问。Anonymous accounts are typically only encountered only from within ASP.NET-based applications when anonymous access is allowed by Internet Information Services (IIS). ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何使用属性来检测系统是否用户帐户标识为匿名帐户。The following code shows the use of the property to detect whether the user account is identified as an anonymous account by the system. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. An object for the token owner.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SID 唯一标识用户或组在所有 Windows NT 实现。The SID uniquely identifies a user or group on all Windows NT implementations. 返回的 SID 标识默认所有者将应用于新创建的对象的 SID。The returned SID identifies the default owner SID that will be applied to newly created objects. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来显示标记所有者的安全标识符。The following code example shows the use of the property to display the security identifier for the token owner. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class [!code-csharp[System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers#19](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers/CS/windowsidentitymembers.cs#19)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers#19](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers/VB/Form1.vb#19)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property Token As IntPtr
public: virtual property IntPtr Token { IntPtr get(); };

summary.span: 获取用户的 Windows 帐户标记。

span.span: Gets the Windows account token for the user.

value.span: 与当前执行线程关联的访问令牌的句柄。

span.span: The handle of the access token associated with the current execution thread.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不要显式释放返回的用户的帐户标记属性。Do not explicitly release the account token that is returned by the property. 由发布令牌方法，可以在代码中调用该方法。The token is released by the method, which you can call in code. 此外会自动由垃圾回收器调用。 is also automatically called by the garbage collector. > [!NOTE] > 返回用户的帐户标记属性是用于创建 Windows 令牌的重复对象，并自动释放由.NET Framework。The account token that is returned by the property is a duplicate of the Windows token that is used to create the object and is automatically released by the .NET Framework. 这是不同于用户的帐户标记 (`userToken`构造函数参数)，用于创建对象。This is different from the account token (the `userToken` parameter for the constructor), which is used to create the object. `userToken` 是通过调用创建的 Windows 帐户标记`LogonUser`和必须关闭，以避免内存泄漏。`userToken` is a Windows account token that is created by a call to `LogonUser` and must be closed to avoid a memory leak. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何使用属性来获取用户的 Windows 帐户标记。The following code shows the use of the property to get the Windows account token for the user. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers#14](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers/CPP/windowsidentitymembers.cpp#14)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers/CS/windowsidentitymembers.cs#14)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers/VB/Form1.vb#14)]

span.span: for the ability to access unmanaged code.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property User As SecurityIdentifier

summary.span: 获取用户的安全标识符 (SID)。

span.span: Gets the security identifier (SID) for the user.
An object for the user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SID 唯一标识用户或组在所有 Windows NT 实现。The SID uniquely identifies a user or group on all Windows NT implementations. > [!NOTE] > 返回对象方法不是 Windows 匿名用户相同。The object returned by the method is not the same as the Windows anonymous user. 此属性获取`null`表示匿名用户对象返回的方法; 它不会获取表示匿名 Windows 用户的 SID。This property gets `null` for an anonymous user represented by the object returned by the method; it does not get the SID representing an anonymous Windows user.
